actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, S. Rept. 94-1231.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Allen Camp Unit, Pit River division, Central Valley project, California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Allen Camp unit of the Central Valley project in California. Authorizes the Secretary to replace roads and bridges which would be inundated by the project. Places restrictions on the use of water from such project. Authorizes the appropriation of $64,220,000 for construction of the unit.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Allen Camp Unit, Pit River division, Central Valley project, California, and for other purposes.
